channel.description: Thank You for visiting my homepage.

item.title: Dynamic arguments in argparse subparser
item.description: A basic guide to manipulating python's ArgumentParser object at your will - Past month, while working on some command-line tool written in python based on argparse, I was faced with task of adding some new arguments to extend some functionality. The only problem was the number and name of arguments were dynamic, i.e., they depended on the value supplied to some other...

item.title: bug.log.1
item.description: the safe way to model object creation with django-ninja - Starting a series where I would be compiling some of the bugs I run into during my software development projects.
